title: A Footnote for Tomorrow
description: A personal perspective of one individual's battle with drug and alcohol addiction. Taking place in the 2000's while travelling the country in an attempt to outrun his addiction. Poet James MIller's collection conveys the struggle, the emotion, the turmoil of the daily ups and downs endured on his quest. Trying to outrun the familiarity of the local drug scene, the poet opens his soul and his notepad to journal the journey down a strange path towards recovery. One individual's fall from grace while battling addiction, withdrawal, relapse, and pulling away from society as a whole.
author: James F. Miller II
